name: ABC
text: .@jonkarl: “I’m practically speechless, here. I have been covering the White House on and off for two decades … Here we have the entire South Lawn of the White House transformed into the hall, the venue, for a national political convention.” https://t.co/FTut6C9nDs #RNC2020 https://t.co/7tYn8zxMQQ

name: ABC
text: Kellyanne Conway: “A woman in a leadership role can still seem novel — not so, for President Trump … President Trump helped me shatter a barrier in the world of politics by empowering me to manage his campaign to its successful conclusion.” https://t.co/m99ndb2sBi #RNC2020 https://t.co/3PSlriRTob

name: ABC
text: In terms of their approach to coronavirus safety, Democrats and Republicans have largely followed different standards. https://t.co/hgpJ4igyNZ

name: ABC
text: The death toll from two days of heavy flooding in northern and eastern Afghanistan rises to at least 150, with scores more injured as rescue crews search for survivors beneath the mud and rubble of collapsed houses. https://t.co/nYw4K4I34z

name: ABC
text: Franklin Graham, President and CEO of Billy Graham Evangelistic Association, kicks off the final night of #RNC2020 with an opening prayer. https://t.co/FTut6C9nDs https://t.co/7deWz3dmWP

name: ABC
text: The Democratic National Committee plans to counter President Trump's convention speech with an ad casting Trump as a failed leader by using his own words from the 2016 convention. https://t.co/N82t96o4Rm

name: ABC
text: White House advisor Ja'Ron Smith: "Growing up, I'd never really known a Republican. I believed all the stereotypes. It took meeting Republicans who shared my values to show me I was wrong." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/KhTpQk2kCv

name: ABC
text: Rep. Kevin McCarthy: “Four years ago President Trump promised to be your voice. He kept that promise, but there’s still so much more to do. The choice before you cannot be clearer: forward in freedom or backward in socialism.” https://t.co/ggES0fj0kS #RNC2020 https://t.co/tiJiRM6vhT

name: ABC
text: White House advisor Ja'Ron Smith on Pres. Trump: "For a New Yorker, he's got a lot of Cleveland heart. And I'm proud to say that he's my president." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/2UlVvDQGNf

name: ABC
text: WH adviser Ja’Ron Smith: “In the wake of the murder of Ahmaud Arbery, George Floyd and Legend Taliferro — a moment of national racial consciousness, I have seen [Trump’s] true conscience. I just wish everyone can see the deep empathy he shows to families.” https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/P0B4IPzW4u

name: ABC
text: A federal judge has ruled that the Education Department must temporarily hold off on implementing a controversial rule that would have directed congressionally approved COVID-19 relief funds away from public schools. https://t.co/usiwy5hqFL

name: ABC
text:
Rep. Jeff Van Drew, who switched to the GOP earlier this year, slams Speaker Pelosi and "the Squad."

"I was already uncomfortable with a San Francisco liberal running the House," he says, adding that now "the Party had moved from liberal to radical." https://t.co/exz8JTGGdE https://t.co/8DtYH0wnU0

name: ABC
text: Rep. Jeff Van Drew, who left the Democratic Party to become a Republican: “Joe Biden is being told what to do by the radicals running my former party, the same radicals trying to install him as their puppet president.” https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 #RNC2020 https://t.co/rSHTkml4PP

name: ABC
text: White House social media director Dan Scavino says Trump voters saw through the "fog machine" of the media: "In 2016...you found your way through the swamp, and you arrived safely on the other side, with Donald J. Trump as your new president." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/Lg3RHOmiAs

name: ABC
text: Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell tells #RNC2020 he is "immensely proud of the work the Republican Senate has done" under President Trump. "We are the firewall against Nancy Pelosi’s agenda." https://t.co/XjaCX2d6yJ https://t.co/HwLUqwrQGJ

name: ABC
text: UFC President Dana White: “This pandemic has also taught us to be very, very careful who you select as your next governor, senator, congressperson and mayor. It is so important to vote and don’t think that your vote doesn’t matter.” https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 #RNC2020 https://t.co/Jm1A6sY31A

name: ABC
text: .@rachelvscott is in Black Lives Matters Plaza in Washington, D.C. as protestors march on the final night of #RNC2020 ahead of tomorrow's "March on Washington." https://t.co/AL3W4wottM https://t.co/YAqY9hJs6t

name: ABC
text:
.@matthewjdowd: “I never thought I would see what I’m seeing tonight on the South Lawn. 

I can’t imagine what would have happened if we had done that in 2004 or if Barack Obama had done that in 2012...people’s hair would be on fire.” https://t.co/AL3W4wottM #RNC2020 https://t.co/qy1yItFEzi

name: ABC
text: HUD Sec. Ben Carson: "Our hearts go out to the Blake family...As Jacob's mother has urged the country, let's use our hearts, our love and our intelligence to work together to show the rest of the world how humans are supposed to treat each other." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 #RNC2020 https://t.co/Vo3LcCDyMQ

name: ABC
text: HUD Sec. Ben Carson: "Many on the other side love to incite division by claiming that Pres. Trump is a racist. They could not be more wrong." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/0WFpfaqbS8

name: ABC
text: Police Benevolent Association Pres. Pat Lynch: "The Democrats have walked away from us. They have walked away from police officers. And they've walked away from the innocent people we protect." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/xerQzZ7o2X

name: ABC
text: Former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani: "For President Trump and for us Republicans, all Black lives matter... All lives matter to us. These continuous riots in Democratic cities give you a good view of the future under Biden." https://t.co/2xXRN872rI #RNC2020 https://t.co/n4ewzq1LJj

name: ABC
text:
"God gave us Kayla, and she gave herself to the world."

In heartbreaking testimonial, parents of Kayla Mueller, humanitarian worker captured and killed by ISIS, honor their daughter, praise Pres. Trump, and call on Americans to "stay strong like Kayla." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/WcxGfb4PrR

name: ABC
text: Marsha Mueller: “Carl and I support Donald Trump because of his commitment to make and keep America great … with the passion of people like Kayla … Americans who don’t just talk, they act. That was our daughter, that’s President Trump.” https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 #RNC2020 https://t.co/sqHSotVQof

name: ABC
text:
"The nearly 22 years I spent in prison were not wasted."

Alice Johnson, grandmother whose sentence was commuted by Pres. Trump, calls on people to "take action for those who are forgotten. That's what our president, Donald Trump, did for me." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/UQgG1WZR0t

name: ABC
text: HUD Sec. Ben Carson: "Our hearts go out to the Blake family...As Jacob's mother has urged the country, let's use our hearts, our love and our intelligence to work together to show the rest of the world how humans are supposed to treat each other." https://t.co/Eelym3mwGu #RNC2020 https://t.co/IeZgNKmWdA

name: ABC
text: Ivanka Trump: “Tonight I stand before you as the proud daughter of the people’s president. He is our commander-in-chief, champion of the American worker, defender of common sense and our voice for the forgotten men and women of this country.” https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 #RNC2020 https://t.co/znq4e9Eg5i

name: ABC
text: RT @GMA: EXCLUSIVE: Former pool attendant caught in middle of affair with wife of evangelical power house Jerry Falwell Jr. speaks out to @GStephanopoulos TOMORROW on GMA. https://t.co/w82uCD748GEXCLUSIVE: Former pool attendant caught in middle of affair with wife of evangelical power house Jerry Falwell Jr.… https://t.co/874aa84ASd

name: ABC
text: Sen. Tom Cotton: “We need a president who stands up for America — not one to takes a knee. A strong and proud America is a safe America.” https://t.co/Dzirah0bUB #RNC2020 https://t.co/qLVT3HYaOh

name: ABC
text: Ivanka Trump sparks "four more years" chant on the South Lawn of the White House during #RNC2020. https://t.co/AL3W4wottM #RNC2020 https://t.co/6s7AiehM0c

name: ABC
text: Ivanka Trump: “Our president refuses to surrender his beliefs to score points with the political elite. To my father, you are the elite … Washington has not changed Donald Trump. Donald Trump has changed Washington.” https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 #RNC2020 https://t.co/ZLSXCJufn2

name: ABC
text:
Pres. Trump and Melania Trump appear at the White House ahead of the president's #RNC2020 keynote address. 

The use of the White House as the backdrop for the RNC has sparked ethical and legal questions. https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/Gv06W4VhqQ

name: ABC
text: Pres. Trump on his brother Robert, who passed away earlier this month: "I know my brother Robert is looking down on us right now from Heaven. He was a great brother, and was very proud of the job we are all doing." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/y8mHxXMG0V

name: ABC
text: Chants of "four more years!" break out at the White House after Pres. Trump calls the upcoming presidential contest "the most important election in the history of our country." https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 https://t.co/umMlusj9Gv

name: ABC
text: President Trump: “This election will decide whether we save the American Dream, or whether we allow a socialist agenda to demolish our cherished destiny.” https://t.co/EyJzJDolZ4 #RNC2020 https://t.co/MMR6lY79PO

name: ABC
text: Read the full transcript of Ivanka Trump's #RNC2020 speech: https://t.co/ZVAIqlHmV9 https://t.co/IkVkdIgWZk

name: ABC
text: Pres. Trump: "How can the Democrat Party ask to lead our country when it spends so much time tearing down our country?" https://t.co/SqnVqUUPCk https://t.co/CnzMh2bJg2
